title: To all the people who complain about Yasuo being broken and needing a nerf
body:
Yasuo's winrate in top lane is 50.27% and in midlane is 49.87%. Which puts him at the 26th best midlaner out of 47 and the 28th best top laner out of 55. So obviously he is NOT op in anyway. His winrate is exactly where it needs to be and he is a balanced champ. Too many people are hoping on the "yasuo needs a nerf" bandwagon. In my oppinion he is not that hard to play against and overall is a fun champ to play as or against. You cant argue the facts/statistics they are what the are. so if he needs nerfed so does 20 other midlaners and toplaners. 

If you dont believe me here is where the data comes from:   https://champion.gg/statistics/#?search=yas

replies.body: If people stopped looking at the winrates for their only statistic, maybe riot WOULD do something about champs

No shit he has a low winrate, he has one of the highest play rates in the game.
this makes no sense lol playrate has nothing to do with winrate, look at hecarim or vi for example

Low play rate champions always have higher win rates than high play rate champions, regardless of their actual balance. Galio top has over a 52% winrate, does that mean that he is better than Yasuo? No, because most Yasuo players play him as a secondary or tertiary champion, while most Galio players are Galio mains with hundreds of Galio games.

clearly you didnt actually look up the winrates of the most played champs, like caitlyn, vi, twitch, etc. who all have much higher winrates then yasuo and much higher play rates then him as well. Please use real facts

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/CIF9uBqSNhY/maxresdefault.jpg
Honestly, I wonder how much higher that would be if it wasn't for the ~50% ban rate.

IDK how high it would be, it's wholly irrelevant to the conversation about his winrate/playrate ratio. 

You can't claim "one of the highest playrates in the game" when his playrate is nothing special.

I personally am in the belief that the only thing really broken about Yasuo is the fact that he in theory has CC with a 4 second cooldown. Putting the minimum cooldown on his Q to 2 seconds instead of 1.33 seconds would fix this without ruining him too much and at the same time, some better scaling could be added to his E, making it more than just a tool to get close or away past the early game. I am in favor of nerfing his Q slightly, but buffing the rest of his kit and have been so from the beginning. This might be a personal opinion and I realise his winrate shows him off as really balanced, but I still find this aspect of him too strong and would prefer to see him actually be a bit stronger in other aspects of his kit.

As a Yasou main myself I feel like his kit is a bit overloaded however this doesn't mean he needs a complete rework or nerf. I feel he just needs a slight tweak on his e cool down. .1 seems a bit much and making .1 higher wouldn't be that bad. I've played yasou and that's all I've ever done for a while. However I picked up some zed recently and had a yasou to play against. A fun matchup as I can abuse him early game. But we somehow drag the game for a bit when he becomes relevant again. And once he gets his tornado no squishy wants to get near that thing. However hard cc is a great counter but in low Elo it is used incorrectly rendiring it useless and pointless. That's all I have to say for this post.

The new fervor on Yasuo is absolutely the stupidest crap in several patches. Yasuo was already broken when in front but now if he gets even slightly ahead he is unstoppable. He is stupidly mobile, has a shield, can split push, can team fight, can 1v5, has insane burst, insane armor shred and now he gets insane free extra AD from landing some autos and kills ADC and Mid in 3 or 4 autos. Riot have butchered a lot of balancing lately, Yasuo is the worst in a while.

idk.  I suck at melee champions; I will NOT play them if I don't have to.

But I'm not too bad with Yasuo, because I can't miss cs.  I can play Zed and go 60cs in 20mins, or I can go Yasuo and get 100.  I've played both less than a dozen times.

That tells me all other champions are just too mechanically difficult compared to him, or he's a little OP; at least in some regard.  I don't use OP as he's stupidly broken and unkillable or whatnot, but his kit has an advantage that blows all others out of the water.
